items.title: Israel tells medics and aid groups to prepare for Gaza City evacuation
items.description: Gaza's Hamas-run health ministry says it rejects "any step that would undermine what remains of the health system".

items.title: Appeals court throws out Trump's $500m civil fraud penalty
items.description: In its 323-page ruling, the New York judges stated that the fine was excessive, and likely violated the US Constitution.

items.title: French streamer's death 'not due to trauma', autopsy finds
items.description: The online personality known as Jean Pormanove was found dead in his home in Nice on Monday.

items.title: If a Putin-Zelensky summit takes place, where could it be?
items.description: Geneva, Istanbul and Budapest have been put forward as potential locations - but bilateral talks still remain a long way off.

items.title: UK backs call for Israel to allow foreign media into Gaza
items.description: Governments from 27 countries, including France and Germany, say journalists in Gaza must be protected.
